translations.text: When the sun is put out,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and when the stars fall down,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and when the mountains are blown away,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and when pregnant camels are left untended,<sup foot_note=77595>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and when wild beasts are gathered together,<sup foot_note=77596>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and when the seas are set on fire,<sup foot_note=77597>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and when the souls ˹and their bodies˺ are paired ˹once more˺,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and when baby girls, buried alive, are asked
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: for what crime they were put to death,<sup foot_note=77598>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and when the records ˹of deeds˺ are laid open,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and when the sky is stripped away,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and when the Hellfire is fiercely flared up,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and when Paradise is brought near—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: ˹on that Day˺ each soul will know what ˹deeds˺ it has brought along.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: I do swear by the receding stars
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and the night as it falls
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and the day as it breaks!<sup foot_note=77600>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Indeed, this ˹Quran˺ is the Word of ˹Allah delivered by Gabriel,˺ a noble messenger-angel,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ذِى قُوَّةٍ عِندَ ذِى ٱلْعَرْشِ مَكِينٍ

translations.text: full of power, held in honour by the Lord of the Throne,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: And your fellow man<sup foot_note=77601>1</sup> is not insane.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: And he did see that ˹angel˺ on the clear horizon,<sup foot_note=77602>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and he does not withhold ˹what is revealed to him of˺ the unseen.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: And this ˹Quran˺ is not the word of an outcast devil.<sup foot_note=77603>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: So what ˹other˺ path would you take?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Surely this ˹Quran˺ is only a reminder to the whole world—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: to whoever of you wills to take the Straight Way.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

translations.text: But you cannot will ˹to do so˺, except by the Will of Allah, the Lord of all worlds.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama tashaoona illa anyashaa Allahu rabbu alAAalameen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration
